inlineContent.text: The bitmap uses a row-major layout for pixel storage.
The bitmap can either own its buffer or be bound to an external buffer.
When bound to an external buffer, the bitmap does not manage the buffer’s lifecycle.

abstract.text: A bitmap class that stores and manipulates pixel data using a buffer of unsigned integers.
The bitmap supports operations like filling, updating, and merging pixel data.
Draws the outline of a rectangle on the bitmap.
Initializes a bitmap by binding it to a specified buffer or allocating a new one.
Updates all pixels in the bitmap using a bitwise mask operation.
Fills a quarter-circle with a specified data.
Fills a rounded rectangle with a specified data.
Sets the pixel value at the specified position.
A boolean value indicating whether the buffer is shared with other instances.
Updates the canvas with a portion of the provided mask.
Blends a portion of the source canvas into this canvas.
Fills a triangle with the specified pixel value.
Draws the outline of a rectangle.
Blends a portion of the source mask into this canvas using the specified foreground color.
The width of the bitmap in pixels.
Fills a rectangle with the specified pixel value.
A bitmap class that stores and manipulates pixel data using a buffer of unsigned integers.
The bitmap supports operations like filling, updating, and merging pixel data.
The buffer that stores the pixel information.
Draws a single pixel at the specified coordinates.
Reduces the opacity of all pixels in the mask by applying a scaling factor.
Initializes a bitmap by copying a portion of another bitmap.
Blends pixels from the source mask into this canvas using the specified foreground color.
Creates a new mask by extracting the alpha channel from a canvas.
Fills a circle with the specified pixel value.
Draws a single pixel at the specified point.
Draws the outline of a rounded rectangle.
Accesses the pixel at the specified position.
The size of the bitmap in pixels.
Draws the outline of an arc.
The height of the bitmap in pixels.
Blends pixels from the source canvas into this canvas.
Merges the entire source bitmap into this bitmap at the specified position.
Updates the canvas with the provided mask.
The total area of the bitmap (width × height) in pixels.
Increases the opacity of all pixels in the mask by applying a scaling factor.
The bounds of the bitmap, defining its position and dimensions.
Draws the outline of a triangle.
Fills the entire bitmap with the specified pixel value.
Draws a line between two points.
Gets the pixel value at the specified position.
Fills a rectangular region of the bitmap with the specified pixel value.
Updates pixels in a rectangular region using a bitwise mask operation.
Merges a portion of the source bitmap into this bitmap at the specified position.
Accesses the pixel at the specified index.
